recipe_name: Sweet and spicy nuts and cherries
author: Phil Vickery
method: Place the sugar into a frying pan and heat until melted and golden. Add the chilli flakes and the nuts and cook over a low heat, stirring occasionally, for 2-3 minutes. Add the lime and orange juice, the chopped mint and cherries and stir well to coat in the caramel. To serve, pour the sweet and spicy nuts and cherries into a bowl and garnish with the orange wedges.
